reviews.review_msg: Scope is way too broad, mid terms and exams' syllabus is too much, expects a student to memorize 87 paintings in total + every definition of each term mentioned in class. She talks like the Smart History video.

Do not take a class with this instructor. She is tough on grading exams! I have to self-study on internet with the very little information she provided in class. She is always late for class for no reason.
